awards:
第27届釜山国际电影节(2022)
　　亚洲之窗单元 金智奭奖(提名) 李光国
introduction: Seolhee (Yeo Seolhee) and Hwajeong (Woo Hwajeong) make an impromptu trip to the East Sea while waiting to hear the results of their recent job interviews. The purpose of the trip is to make a wish while watching the sunrise, but nothing happens as they hope. The two argue during the trip and have an accidental meeting while going their separate ways. For audiences who have watched director Lee Kwangkuk′s previous work, A Wing and a Prayer may seem confusing at first. The film does not feature a particularly innovative story structure or strange coincidences that reveal the workings of everyday life. However, during the trip, minor coincidences intervene to unravel the true hearts of the two friends coolly and shake the narrative quietly. The unique senses of humor and wits energize the story that unfolds without a hitch. It is an attractive film that neatly intersects the stories of the two friends and creates a strong cohesion between the stories.
